arts.ttl: Sebastian Hoeneß: “It was an emotional week”
arts.sum: Stuttgart’s coach shares his delight after VfB’s perfect week ended with a 4-0 win in Bochum

arts.ttl: Stuttgart seal perfect week with comfortable win in Bochum
arts.sum: Ermedin Demirović’s hat-trick guided Stuttgart on their way to a straightforward win in Bochum.

arts.ttl: Ermedin Demirović's hat-trick helps Stuttgart to commanding 4-0 victory over Bochum
arts.sum: A much-changed Stuttgart side secured a convincing 4-0 victory away in Bochum, with Ermedin Demirović providing a hat-trick and Atakan Karazor pulling the strings from midfield to help keep their hopes of European qualification alive. Just three minutes later, Ermedin Demirović doubled the lead, finishing clinically after another superb assist from Karazor.

arts.ttl: VfL Bochum vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Pokal finalists aim to end winless Bundesliga streak
arts.sum: Stuttgart booked a place in Berlin’s cup final on Wednesday, but their Bundesliga form has seen them drop into the lower half of the standings.
